title: Silky Van Gogh Tournesols Scarf
description:
Inspired by Vincent Van Gogh’s iconic sunflowers, this silk scarf will make a great accessory to your closet. This trendy and timeless scarf will tie nicely around your neck or wrist. It can also be wrapped around your handbag handles for an added pop of color.

Details:

• 100% Silk

• Made in France

• 2.75x 40 inches
